text: Ahmad Latifovich Alasgarov (, ; born 5 October 1935 - 19 May 2015) was an Azerbaijani footballer and manager. He played as a defender from 1955 until 1965. He managed nine teams between 1966 and 2006, including the Azerbaijan national football team. He was born in Baku. Alasgarov died after a long illness on 19 May 2015 in Odesa, Ukraine, aged 79. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Azerbaijani footballers Category:Football managers Category:People from Baku Category:Soviet footballers
title: Ahmad Alasgarov
